articles.title: Brooklyn Beckham opens up about his wife Nicola Peltz's close relationship with Selena Gomez - Daily Mail
articles.description: The 24-year-old expressed that he was happy to be able to maintain a close relationship with the singer, 30, and remarked that his wife was particularly fond of the performer.
articles.content:
Brooklyn Beckham opened up about his wife Nicola Peltz's friendship with Selena Gomez during his appearance on Thursday's episode of The Jennifer Hudson Show.

articles.title: Henry Rollins: ‘I wouldn’t go back on stage with a band for anything’ - The Guardian
